# NSScrollView.FindBarPosition.aboveContent

**Case**

The find bar is displayed above the scroll view content.

## Declaration

```swift
case aboveContent
```

## Constants

- **NSScrollView.FindBarPosition.aboveHorizontalRuler**: The find bar is displayed above the horizontal ruler, if visible.
- **NSScrollView.FindBarPosition.belowContent**: The find bar is displayed below the scroll view content.

items.description: The find bar is displayed above the horizontal ruler, if visible.
items.name: NSScrollView.FindBarPosition.aboveHorizontalRuler

items.description: The find bar is displayed below the scroll view content.
